mapper.sql: ORGAN_NO, ORGAN_LNO, ORGAN_NAME, ORGAN_FLAG, BRAND_DETAIL_NO, BRAND_DETAIL_ENAME, BRAND_DETAIL_CNAME, REGION_NO, REGION_NAME, MANAGING_PROVINCE_NO, MANAGING_PROVINCE_NAME, MANAGING_AREA_NO, MANAGING_AREA_NAME, MANAGING_CITY_NO, MANAGING_CITY_NAME, BUSINESS_CITY_NO, BUSINESS_CITY_NAME, ORDER_UNIT_NO, ORDER_UNIT_NAME, PROVINCE_NO, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, COUNTY_NO, COUNTY_NAME, PART_AREA_NO, PART_AREA_NAME, BUSINESS_CIRCLE_NO, BUSINESS_CIRCLE_NAME, STORE_LEVEL, OPENDT, CLOSEDT, MALL_NO, MALL_NAME, BUSINESS_GROUP_NO, BUSINESS_GROUP_NAME, LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, STORE_CATEGORY_NO1, STORE_CATEGORY_NAME1, STORE_CATEGORY_NO2, STORE_CATEGORY_NAME2, STORE_CATEGORY_NO3, STORE_CATEGORY_NAME3, STORE_CHANNEL_NO, STORE_CHANNEL_NAME, STORE_CHANNEL_NO2, STORE_CHANNEL_NAME2, STORE_CHANNEL_NO3, STORE_CHANNEL_NAME3, CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, SUBAREA_NO, SUBAREA_NAME
mapper.select:
select distinct t.business_city_no,t.business_city_name,t.BUSINESS_CITY_ORDER,t.MANAGING_CITY_NO from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t where 1=1 and business_city_no is not null
and MANAGING_CITY_NO in (${params.managing_cities})
and BRAND_NO in ${params.brandNo}
and MANAGING_CITY_NO in (${params.MANAGING_CITY_NO})
and REGION_NO in (${params.REGION_NO})
and MANAGING_PROVINCE_NO in (${params.MANAGING_PROVINCE_NO})
and MANAGING_AREA_NO in (${params.MANAGING_AREA_NO})
order by t.BUSINESS_CITY_ORDER

select distinct t.subarea_no,t.subarea_name,t.subarea_order from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t where 1=1 and t.subarea_no is not null
and MANAGING_CITY_NO in (${params.managing_cities})
and BRAND_NO in ${params.brandNo}
and MANAGING_CITY_NO in (${params.MANAGING_CITY_NO})
and REGION_NO in (${params.REGION_NO})
and MANAGING_PROVINCE_NO in (${params.MANAGING_PROVINCE_NO})
and MANAGING_AREA_NO in (${params.MANAGING_AREA_NO})
order by t.subarea_order

select distinct t.business_city_no,t.business_city_name from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t where 1=1 and business_city_no is not null
AND t.managing_city_no in
#{item}
AND t.brand_detail_no in
#{item}
AND 1=2
ORDER BY business_city_name DESC

select distinct t.PART_AREA_NO,t.PART_AREA_NAME,t.PART_AREA_ORDER from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t where 1=1 and PART_AREA_NO is not null
and t.REGION_NO in (${params.REGION_NO})
and t.MANAGING_CITY_NO in (${params.MANAGING_CITY_NO})
and t.BRAND_DETAIL_NO in (${params.BRAND_DETAIL_NO})
AND t.brand_no = #{params.brand_no}
AND 1=2
AND t.brand_no in
#{item}
AND 1=2
AND t.region_no in
#{item}
AND 1=2
order by t.PART_AREA_ORDER

select distinct t.business_circle_no,t.business_circle_name,t.BUSINESS_CIRCLE_ORDER from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t where 1=1 and business_circle_no is not null
and REGION_NO in (${params.REGION_NO})
AND t.managing_city_no in
#{item}
AND t.brand_no in
#{item}
AND 1=2
ORDER BY t.BUSINESS_CIRCLE_ORDER

SELECT DISTINCT T .MALL_NO, T .MALL_NAME, T .business_city_no FROM u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo T WHERE 1 = 1 AND MALL_NO IS NOT NULL
and REGION_NO in (${params.REGION_NO})
ORDER BY business_city_no
select distinct MALL_NO from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo where 1=1 and MALL_NAME = #{value}

select distinct t.BUSINESS_GROUP_NO,t.BUSINESS_GROUP_NAME,T.BUSINESS_GROUP_ORDER from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t where 1=1 and BUSINESS_GROUP_NO is not null
and REGION_NO in (${params.REGION_NO})
ORDER BY T.BUSINESS_GROUP_ORDER
select distinct t.LOCATION_NO,t.LOCATION_NAME,t.location_order from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t where t.LOCATION_NO is not null order by t.location_order
select distinct t.CATEGORY_NO,t.CATEGORY_NAME from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t

SELECT DISTINCT s.COUNTY_NO, s.COUNTY_NAME from u_md_dm.dim_org_store_allinfo s WHERE s.city_no is not null AND s.county_name is not null
AND s.region_no in
#{item}
AND 1=2
select distinct t.CATEGORY_NO,t.CATEGORY_NAME from u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t WHERE T.CATEGORY_NO IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM U_MD_DM.DIM_ORG_ALLINFO WHERE 1=1

SELECT
FROM U_MD_DM.DIM_ORG_ALLINFO WHERE 1=1
select distinct store_category_no1,store_category_name1 from U_MD_DM.DIM_ORG_ALLINFO order by store_category_no1

WHERE ORGAN_NO = #{organNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT PROVINCE_NO,PROVINCE_NAME FROM U_MD_DM.DIM_ORG_ALLINFO WHERE PROVINCE_NO IS NOT NULL OR PROVINCE_NAME IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT COUNTY_NO,COUNTY_NAME FROM U_MD_DM.DIM_ORG_ALLINFO WHERE COUNTY_NO IS NOT NULL OR COUNTY_NAME IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT t.MALL_NO, t.MALL_NAME FROM u_md_dm.dim_org_allinfo t WHERE 1 = 1 AND MALL_NO IS NOT NULL
and REGION_NO in (${params.REGION_NO})
and t.business_circle_no in
#{item}
and t.BRAND_NO in
#{item}
and t.MANAGING_CITY_NO in
#{item}
and 1=2
and 1=2
ORDER BY MALL_NO

SELECT DISTINCT BRAND_DETAIL_NO,SAL_GENRE_NO,SAL_GENRE_NAME ,SAL_GENRE_ORDER from u_md_dm.DIM_PRO_SAL_GENRE WHERE SAL_GENRE_NO is not null AND SAL_GENRE_NAME is not null
AND BRAND_DETAIL_NO in
#{item}
AND 1=2
ORDER BY SAL_GENRE_ORDER

SELECT DISTINCT BRAND_DETAIL_NO,STYLE_SOURCE_NO,STYLE_SOURCE_NAME ,STYLE_SOURCE_ORDER from u_md_dm.DIM_PRO_STYLE_SOURCE WHERE STYLE_SOURCE_NO is not null AND STYLE_SOURCE_NAME is not null
AND BRAND_DETAIL_NO in
#{item}
AND 1=2
ORDER BY STYLE_SOURCE_ORDER

SELECT DISTINCT BRAND_DETAIL_NO,RD_SITE_NO,RD_SITE_NAME ,RD_SITE_ORDER from u_md_dm.DIM_PRO_RD_SITE WHERE RD_SITE_NO is not null AND RD_SITE_NAME is not null
AND BRAND_DETAIL_NO in
#{item}
AND 1=2
ORDER BY RD_SITE_ORDER

SELECT DISTINCT BRAND_DETAIL_NO,LARGE_CATEGORY_NO,LARGE_CATEGORY_NAME ,LARGE_CATEGORY_ORDER from u_md_dm.DIM_PRO_LARGE_CATEGORY WHERE LARGE_CATEGORY_NO is not null AND LARGE_CATEGORY_NAME is not null
AND BRAND_DETAIL_NO in
#{item}
AND 1=2
ORDER BY LARGE_CATEGORY_ORDER
